reg.title: Tobacco Sales Regulation
reg.amsincluded: [includes amendments up to B.C. Reg. 119/2005, April 15, 2005]

section.sectiontext: The age for the purposes of section 2 (2) of the Act is 19 years.
The minimum number of cigarettes that must be in a package if the package is to be sold, offered for sale, distributed, advertised or promoted to persons is 20.

subsection.subsectiontext: For tobacco sold or offered for sale other than by a vending machine, the dealer must ensure that each of the following decals issued by the minister is displayed:

paragraph.paragraphtext: a 10 cm x 10 cm decal, affixed to the side of each cash register facing purchasers being served at that cash register, stating

section.subparasandwich: "Tobacco is the number one preventable cause of death and disease. It is illegal to sell tobacco to anyone under 19 years of age. Valid photo ID may be required.",

paragraph.paragraphtext: a 4 cm x 8 cm decal, containing the same statement as that specified in paragraph (a) affixed to the drawer of each cash register so as to face the dealer or employee working the register, and
a 17 cm x 35 cm decal, as set out in Schedule 1, on view in front of every place in the business location where tobacco products are displayed for sale.

subsection.subsectiontext: A dealer who operates a tobacco vending machine must ensure that the warning decal described in subsection (1) (c) is affixed to the front of the vending machine facing the purchaser.
The warning decals described in subsections (1) and (2) must not be obscured by a sign, notice or any other thing that could render the decal less visible to any purchaser.
Each dealer for whom a certificate has been issued under section 9 of the Act must ensure that a sign described in subsection (2) and issued by the minister is posted at

paragraph.paragraphtext: each place where tobacco was displayed for sale at the business location identified in the certificate before the notice of intention under section 8 of the Act was served, or
each entrance to the business location identified in the certificate.
